chapters.name: Definitions of AI and Why They Matter
topics: What is artificial intelligence — and why is there no single agreed-upon definition?

chapters.name: A Brief History of the Idea of Thinking Machines
topics: Where did the idea of a thinking machine come from — and how far back does it go?
